suite.name: CreateCharacters

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{usuario} = { email=edsonj82@gmail.com }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '31', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "edsonj82@gmail.com"}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${client_key} = 613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{HEADERS} = { client_key=613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767 }

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
kw.msg: ${HEADERS} = {'client_key': '613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767'}

kw.name: DELETE
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/delorean path_url=/delorean headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Factory Mv
kw.msg: &{personagem} = { name=Christopher Mccarty | aliases=Thanos | age=3000 | team=Ordem Negra | active=False }

kw.name: POST New Character
POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767', 'Content-Length': '105', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Christopher Mccarty", "aliases": "Thanos", "age": 3000, "team": "Ordem Negra", "active": false}'
${response} = <Response [200]>
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

test.name: NÃ£o deve cadastrar com o mesmo nome

kw.name: Factory Deadpool
kw.msg: ${personagem} = {'name': 'Wade Wilson', 'aliases': 'Deadpool', 'age': 40, 'team': 'X Force', 'active': False}

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767', 'Content-Length': '93', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Wade Wilson", "aliases": "Deadpool", "age": 40, "team": "X Force", "active": false}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: POST New Character
POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '613d4f82f2ac8700162fe767', 'Content-Length': '93', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Wade Wilson", "aliases": "Deadpool", "age": 40, "team": "X Force", "active": false}'
${response} = <Response [409]>
${response} = <Response [409]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

suite.doc: Suite de Teste do cadastro de personagens na API da Marvel
